Title: Avatar
Synopsis: A paraplegic marine dispatched to the moon Pandora becomes torn between following orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

Title: Inception
Synopsis: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is tasked with planting an idea into a CEO's mind.

Title: The Dark Knight
Synopsis: Batman faces the Joker in a battle of chaos and morality.

Title: Forrest Gump
Synopsis: A simple man witnesses key moments of American history with kindness and innocence.

Title: Pulp Fiction
Synopsis: The lives of criminals intertwine in a web of violence and redemption.

Title: Inglourious Basterds
Synopsis: A group of Jewish soldiers plot to assassinate Nazi leaders during World War II.

Title: Shutter Island
Synopsis: Two U.S. marshals investigate a disappearance at a psychiatric hospital.

Title: Fight Club
Synopsis: An office worker and a soap maker form an underground fight club.

Title: Se7en
Synopsis: Two detectives hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motive.

Title: The Shining
Synopsis: A man descends into madness while caring for an isolated hotel.

Title: Oppenheimer
Synopsis: The story of J. Robert Oppenheimer, who led the creation of the atomic bomb.

Title: Dune: Part Two
Synopsis: Paul Atreides unites with the Fremen to avenge his family and save Arrakis.
